node.display_long_description:
How work should be.

Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

During a time when collaboration feels disconnected, unclear, and inefficient, Spatial enables you to - 

SIT NEXT TO EACH OTHER FROM ACROSS THE WORLD
- Create your lifelike 3D avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Your avatar talks, moves, and interacts, mirroring in-person collaborative sessions

MAKE YOUR ROOM YOUR MONITOR & YOUR HANDS YOUR MOUSE
- Fill your room with information, defying the limits of your 2D screen
- Enjoy beautiful immersive 3D environments & Upload your own custom environments 
- Express and share ideas w/ whiteboarding, notes, & photo/3D model search 

USE ALL YOUR FAVORITE TOOLS
- Use our web app or Spatial Cast to bring in your desktop 
- Host Abilities
- Upload many 2D/3D file types 
- Integrate with Slack, Google Drive, & more

JOIN FROM ANY DEVICE
- VR + AR (Quest, Nreal, HoloLens, Magic Leap)
- Mobile (iOS + Android) & Web

nodes.title: Spatial 4.0! An Entirely New Web Experience, Tools for Artists and So Much More! üßë‚Äçüé®
nodes.body_text:
This release changes everything  üëÄ Read on to hear what's new!
 
üñºÔ∏è New Gallery Environment
Beautiful and sleek design, this environment is incredible for its sticky walls and curation potential! A gallery set afloat with bobbing icebergs, you need to experience this amazing canvas for creation! This place is perfect for uploading your NFTs and displaying them proudly in your own personal gallery!



üîÆNFT Gallery Support
We are thrilled to support this community of artists and are grateful for those who have embraced Spatial. We have many Gallery openings lined up on our Event Calendar!

‚ú® Integration with your Metamask wallet
‚ú® Gallery Frames for Images & Videos
‚ú® Gallery Pedestal for 3D Models
‚ú® Descriptive Caption Panel for your Art!



üëå Interactive Web Experience (Beta)
Quickly and Easily jump right into an interactive experience right in your desktop browser! Show up as your avatar and feel more present with everyone involved regardless of device.

Click on the screen or use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move yourself around



üñ•Ô∏è PCVR on Steam
Spatial finally works on any headset that is supported by the Steam VR Platform! This includes headsets such as the Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift, HP Reverb, Varjo, Windows Mixed Reality, and more!



üï∫GIF File Support
FINALLY upload your favorite gifs! Need we say more?



We are On Discord Now!




EVENT: 4.0 Launch Gallery Meet Up! Spatial will be hosting a Gallery Open House!




Reach out we'd love to meet you! Hello@spatial.io

node.reviewDescription: We love using Spatial for team meetings, one on one meetings and using it as a general workspace. We are a VR first company and this is a great solution for us! Our team is VR first, 100% remote, and we plan on using Spatial as a tool for continuing to build our workspace on the metaverse. Thanks for creating a great product!

website_page_meta.description:
Spatial brings people together for hangouts, immersive presentations, team planning, product reviews, & brainstorms.

Spatial enables you to:

- Upload your own Custom Environments
- Sit next to each other from across the world by creating a lifelike avatar from a selfie in seconds
- Fill your room with  2D/3D content, including screen share, browser, sticky notes and whiteboarding
- Integrate with tools like Slack or Google
- Join from VR, AR, Web, & Mobile
